 To apply for admission into the South Cape TVET College SCC Application Form 2024, kindly follow the link and apply online. All applications must be submitted online.

South Cape TVET College

South Cape TVET College is a public Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) college located in the Western Cape province of South Africa. The college provides quality vocational education and training programs and courses to prepare students for the job market or further studies. Here is some more information about South Cape TVET College:

Campuses: The college has five campuses located in the towns of George, Mossel Bay, Beaufort West, Oudtshoorn, and Bitou.

Programs and courses: South Cape TVET College offers a wide range of programs and courses in areas such as business studies, engineering, hospitality, information technology, safety in society, tourism, and primary health care.

Admission requirements: The admission requirements for South Cape TVET College may vary depending on the program or course you are interested in. Generally, applicants must have a National Senior Certificate (NSC) or equivalent qualification, and meet any additional requirements specific to their chosen program.

Application process: To apply to South Cape TVET College, you can visit the college’s official website at www.sctvet.ac.za for information on the application process. On the website, you will find information on the application requirements, admission procedures, and the programs and courses offered by the college.

Student support services: South Cape TVET College provides a range of student support services, including career guidance, counselling, academic support, and financial aid to help students succeed in their studies.

Partnerships and collaborations: The college has partnerships with various local and international organizations and institutions to provide students with access to industry-relevant training and work-integrated learning opportunities.

What to Know About the South Cape TVET College Application Form Portal

The South Cape TVET College SCC Application portal is designed to accept application of candidates seeking for admission into the University. In the portal, applicant can Purchase application form, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slip, check admission list, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the SCC application portal, candidates must;

  • Have Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to SCC on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

How to Apply | SCC Application Form 2024

South Cape TVET College online application login

To log in to the online application portal for South Cape TVET College, follow these steps:
  1. Visit the college’s official website at www.sctvet.ac.za.
  2. Click on the “Apply Now” button located on the homepage.
  3. You will be directed to the online application portal. Click on the “Login” button at the top of the page.
  4. Enter your username and password that you created when you registered for the online application portal.
  5. Click on the “Login” button.
  6. Once you have logged in, you can access your online application form, track the progress of your application, and make any necessary updates or changes to your application.

 

South Cape TVET College Application Required Documents

To apply to SCC you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into the South Cape TVET College, kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.

South Cape TVET College Courses

South Cape TVET College offers a variety of courses in different fields of study. Here are some of the courses that are currently offered at the college:
  1. Business Studies:
  • Management Assistant N4-N6
  • Marketing Management N4-N6
  • Human Resource Management N4-N6
  • Financial Management N4-N6
  • Public Management N4-N6
  1. Engineering Studies:
  • Civil Engineering N1-N6
  • Electrical Engineering N1-N6
  • Mechanical Engineering N1-N6
  • Chemical Engineering N1-N3
  1. Hospitality and Tourism:
  • Hospitality and Catering Services N4-N6
  • Tourism N4-N6
  1. Information and Communication Technology:
  • Information Technology and Computer Science N4-N6
  1. Safety in Society:
  • Policing N4-N6
  1. Primary Health Care:
  • Community Health Work NQF Level 4

FAQ South Cape TVET College Online Application

Here are some frequently asked questions about the online application process at South Cape TVET College:

How do I apply to South Cape TVET College online?

To apply to South Cape TVET College online, visit the college’s official website at www.sctvet.ac.za and click on the “Apply Now” button located on the homepage. You will then be directed to the online application portal, where you can register and complete the application form.

What documents do I need to apply online?

The documents required for online application to South Cape TVET College may vary depending on the program or course you are applying for. However, in general, you will need to provide a certified copy of your ID or passport, your most recent academic qualifications, and any other supporting documents that may be required for your chosen program.

What is the application fee for online application?

The application fee for online application to South Cape TVET College may vary depending on the program or course you are applying for. However, in general, the application fee is non-refundable and must be paid during the online application process.

How do I track the progress of my online application?

To track the progress of your online application, you can log in to your online application portal account on the college’s website. You can also contact the admissions office at the college for updates on your application status.

When is the deadline for online application?

The deadline for online application to South Cape TVET College may vary depending on the program or course you are applying for. However, in general, applications are accepted throughout the year, and prospective students are advised to apply as early as possible to avoid disappointment.
